remarks: The set of Hermitian (self-adjoint) operators on a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hmoval.8 $e |- H = ( HmOp ` U ) $.
hmoval.9 $e |- A = ( U adj U ) $.
hmoval $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> H = { t e. dom A | ( A ` t ) = t } ) $.
$d A t $.
$d U t $.
